item.title: US-20 East Exit 315
item.description: US-20 east approaching Exit 315, ID-43/Ucon, 1 mile.

item.title: US-20 East at Exit 315 - ID-43/Ucon
item.description: ID-43/Ucon Exit on US-20 East. When this photo was taken US-20 did not yet have exit numbers. The have since been assigned.
